pages.text: This seed can be found in Jungle Temples and can be $(l:hexalia:rituals/transmutation_ritual)transmuted$() into a Kelpweave Sword.

This is also known as the Cabbage that bites, its seeds can be obtained in a $(l:hexalia:rituals/transmutation_ritual)Transmutation Ritual$(), this item can be thrown to an entity to damage them and make them bleed.
